ticket.title: ActionController::Base.hidden_actions no longer filters out base methods
ticket.original-body:
Either the documentation should be updated to reflect it's current state or the functionality should be brought back.
I'm in favor of restoring the functionality.
Current Code: @@@ ruby def hidden_actions read_inheritable_attribute(:hidden_actions) || write_inheritable_attribute(:hidden_actions, []) end @@@
Possible Solution: @@@ ruby def hidden_actions read_inheritable_attribute(:hidden_actions) || write_inheritable_attribute(:hidden_actions, ActionController::Base.public_instance_methods.map(&:to_s)) end @@@
